TopicTitle: problem in VAB due to a mod

Articles.Content:
Image of my (working) gamedata folder.

Today I updated

AIES - using only the fuel tank folder

FAR

ProcFairings

and added

Targetron

SpaceJunk_Bay_1.04

MagicSmokeIndustries 0.7

Romfarer RoboticArmsPack v281

SurfaceMountEngines

I gradually reverted the changes and started the game - my problem only went away when I reestablished my gamedata folder from yesterday - last things reverted (in one go):

ProcFairings - down one version again

RoboticArmsPack - deleted

MagicSmokeIndustries 0.7 - deleted

My problem was as follows:

First I built a new craft with some of the new parts: JunkBay, both Arms, one MagicSmoke part - everything looked fine, I fooled around with the arms and reverted back to VAB.

Upon loading a craft file from yesterday to continue to build, parts removed from the craft would either become undeletable and couldnt be reattached to the craft or parts couldnt be removed at all. The staging column did not always update correctly, leaving blank spaces from the removed parts. The Center of X indicators were not visible on the craft but much further down in the VAB. After a while serious lagging would start, updating the game every 5-10 seconds, seemingly slowing even more - ALT-4 to the rescue.

Does anyone know about incompatibilities or bugs in the mentioned mods that might provoke such behaviour of the game?
